trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Miamisburg
There were no other sightings in Miamisburg on or around December 12th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI witnessed 2 torpedo like objects hovering. No sound or contrails and no prescence of any other planes. They were gray spheres and seemed to sometimes be metallic. I know it was not a plane and they did not appear to have wings.
